SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.PROCS_ID , A.PROCS_NM , B.CODE_NM PROCS_STTUS , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREAT_DT , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES FROM COMTNPROCESSMON A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND A.PROCS_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
A.PROCS_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
B.CODE_NM = #searchKeyword#
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(A.PROCS_ID) as totcnt FROM COMTNPROCESSMON A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND A.PROCS_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
A.PROCS_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
B.CODE_NM = #searchKeyword#
